day1: The starting position is lying on your back. Fasten your hands behind your head or on your chest. Spread your elbows to the sides. Bend your legs slightly at the knees at an angle of 45-60 degrees and lift them off the floor. Now start raising your head. Stretch your chin to your chest. Reach the maximum possible point for you and return to the starting position.

Lie on your side, lean on your elbow. Then lift the body so that you get an absolutely straight line without sagging and protruding parts. At the same time, you should not feel pain, only tension. You need to perform the exercise on each hand in turn.

Lie down on the floor, slightly bend your knees. Slowly lift the body and start twisting first in one direction, then in the other. Try to touch the opposite knee with your elbow. At the bottom point, do not lie completely on your back. Stay two centimeters off the floor. Hold it behind your head.

Lying on your stomach, lift your chest and outstretched legs as high as you can. Hands at this time lie along the body. Then extend your arms forward and maintain the assumed position for five deep breaths. Put your hands behind your back, grab your ankles and try to swing back and forth a little.
day3: Lie on your back, bend your knees, and put your hands along your body, palms down. As you exhale, lift your hips up to the highest possible point. At this point, you need to lock in for a few seconds. Your back should remain straight at the same time. As you inhale, slowly return to the starting position.

Kneel down and rest your forearms on the floor. The back is straight, slightly bent at the waist, looking forward. Next, take a breath and pull one leg back, fixing it at the top point for a few seconds. On exhalation, return to the starting position.

Lie on your right side, lean your right hand on the floor, put your left hand on your waist or on the floor. The right leg is straight, the left is bent at an angle of 90 degrees. Pull the toe of the right foot over yourself and lift it to the maximum possible point. Then return the leg to its original position.

Stand up straight, feet shoulder-width apart, arms outstretched. Slowly begin to squat. Lower your buttocks as if there is a chair behind you that you can sit on, that is, to the level when the hips are parallel to the floor. Now slowly rise, controlling each movement.
day5: ups on one leg - 2 sets, 10 reps.

Get on your knees. Take the emphasis lying down, placing your hands under the upper part of your chest. The distance between the palms should be slightly more than the width of the shoulders. From the bottom point, start lifting the body, leaning on your hands and knees, but at the same time keep your foot on the weight and pull it up. Abs and buttocks are tense. If it is difficult, you can do push-ups with your legs bent at the knees.

Make a bar. The body should be a kind of straight line, the abs and buttocks are tense. Bend your right leg at the knee and pull it up to your chest. Rest your toe on the floor, then return your foot to the starting position. Repeat the same with the other leg.
day7: Sit on the floor, bend your knees and press one foot to the other. Spread your knees apart and place your palms on them. Gently pressing on them, press your knees to the floor, trying to achieve full contact along the entire outer surface of the leg. Hold for 10-15 seconds and release the pressure.

Sit on the mat, stretch your right leg out in front of you, and bend your left knee and throw it behind your right. Then turn the torso to the left and rest the elbow of the right hand on the knee of the left leg. Hold this position for a few seconds.
Get on all fours, slouch with all your might. Keep the pose for 15 seconds. Then bend your back and look up. Hold this position for 15 seconds.
Lying on your back and bending your legs, try to get your chin to your knees, and your knees to your chin. At the same time, swing with your arms wrapped around your legs.

Rules: You need to consume 1.5-2 liters of water every day. Tea, coffee and other drinks do not count, so you will not be able to cheat. We recommend starting every morning with a glass of water with lemon.

Fast food, bread, sweets? Forget about it, it's better to eat fruits or salads, from which you will get much more benefit. If you want something sweet, then do not deny yourself a piece of bitter chocolate. In order not to torment yourself while going to the grocery store, just do not forget to eat before leaving.

You should consume food according to a schedule, at the same time. It is also necessary to have a snack between main meals. So your body will be calm, and you will be able to speed up your metabolism and not feel hungry.
Movement. You have to move. Take a walk, walk to work or take the escalator up.

Remember, you should not think that you have already reached the desired weight. Imagine that proper nutrition and physical activity have already become part of your lifestyle. Enjoy life, be positive. The psychological attitude is very important. Remember that what matters is only what happens regularly.
Get rid of salt. It retains water in the body, which is worse for you.
Try not to use sauces from the store. They are high in calories, full of artificial additives, so you should prepare the sauces yourself.
Drink green tea, fruit and vegetable juices. Do not abuse coffee, purchased juices and tea with sugar. Also, do not drink alcohol, it is high in calories and helps to whet the appetite.
Breakfast: Buckwheat with boiled chicken, lettuce leaf.
Oat flakes and some dried fruits, low-fat milk and fruit.
A hot sandwich made of whole grain bread.
Porridge of oat flakes with a spoonful of raisins.
Boiled buckwheat with a tablespoon of vegetable oil.
Scrambled eggs, a large tomato, a sandwich of cheese and black bread.
Low-fat cottage cheese mixed with parsley, radish and herbs.
Snack1: Low-fat cottage cheese, fresh or frozen berries.
One cup of kefir (1% fat content) and two grain loaves.
One boiled egg and a glass of vegetable juice.
Lunch: Chicken and vegetable soup. Chopped tomatoes, cucumbers, bell peppers, onions and lettuce leaves with olive oil.
Broccoli baked with cod. Fresh lettuce leaf.
Boiled, stewed or baked chicken breast without skin with boiled rice. Light vegetable salad.
Veal with steamed potatoes. Tomato and cheese salad.
Vegetarian soup with a slice of second-rate bread. Salad of vegetables, seasoned with olive oil.
Lean grilled fish and boiled potatoes. Salad of greens, seasoned with lemon juice.
Stewed liver with buckwheat garnish. Vegetable slicing.
Snack2: One cup of yogurt (2.5% fat content) and two grain loaves.
Natural yogurt (1.5% fat content), dietary bread.
Dinner: Baked bell pepper stuffed with brown rice and minced beef. Cherry tomatoes with soft cheese and some greens.
Fish fillet with a side dish of vegetables. Natural yogurt.
Grilled or stewed lean fish. Salad of greens, seasoned with lemon juice.
Salmon with a side dish of rice. Sliced tomatoes.
Omelet of two proteins with low-fat milk, tomatoes and green onions.
Casserole with cheese, lean veal and vegetables. Sandwich of second-grade bread and pink salmon.
Stewed or baked veal. Fresh cabbage salad.
